name: Splat (TwoHorns)
description:
Made for the Mini Jam 111. In this game you slay slimes and dodge bullets. You have a clone which would mirror your movement. To fit into the jam's given limitation "You Are Your Own Enemy", we made it so that the bullets shot by your clone could hurt you. And to follow the theme "Colors", the slimes you slay would burst into a spectrum of beautiful colors. There is no end goal, You play for as long as you could survive. We hope you like this game. Thankyou!

Credits:
